Text.Value: On second thought, I'll have it myself.

Synopsis:
In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. If the player coaxes him with food or is nice to him, he will cautiously consider approaching - but is scared off before he gets too close.

An owlbear cub - young, but still dangerous - appears in camp. The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp.
The cub is scared, and quick to run or attack - it's an untamed wild animal.
